name: The Idle Bucket
description:
"In a world where you have a bucket. And items. And credits.
And you get credits when you add certain items in the bucket...
A young hero rises to fill the bucket...
Will you be that hero? The game sounds easy, huh? 
Then let's get to filling that bucket!"

The Idle Bucket is a game in which you have to fill a bucket with various items. 

By combining certain items you will receive credits. With credits, you buy new items to experiment with. Your imagination is the limit!

For unlocking an achievement for the second time you will receive a different amount of credits compared to when the achievement is unlocked the first time. So you'll have to figure out what purchases are smarter...

You can advance to a new venue once you have unlocked all achievements for the venue you are currently in. 

The game is still in very early development. Please be nice.  :)

If you have any bugs or feature requests, please contact us at idlebucket@twinsaber.com or via @twinsaber on twitter
